sen.j: 服部 半蔵（はっとり はんぞう）は、戦国時代 (日本)から江戸時代初期にかけて松平氏〜徳川氏の麾下で活躍した武士で、代々「半蔵」を仮名 (通称)の名乗りとした服部半蔵家の歴代当主たちである。
sen.e: Hanzo HATTORI were samurais working directly under the Matsudaira clan and the Tokugawa clan during the Edo Period, and refers to the successive family heads of the Hattori clan who assumed the name of 'Hanzo' for generations.

Hanzo HATTORI was samurai working under the command of Matsudaira clan and the Tokugawa clan from the Sengoku period (period of warring states) to the early Edo Period, and refers to the successive family heads of the Hattori clan who assumed the name of 'Hanzo' for generations.
sen.cmt: were samurais→was samuraiとしました。（下記にあるように服部半蔵は襲名されており、同時に何人もの服部半蔵が存在したわけではないので、単数形でよいのではないかと思われたのと、「7人の侍」の英語が「seven samurai」なので、複数形であるにしてもsamuraiは単複同形と理解してよいと思われたからです。）directly under→under the command of｢戦国時代から･･･初期にかけて」が抜けていました(during the Edo Periodだけの表記でした）ので補いました。
sen.e: Hanzo HATTORI was samurai working under the command of Matsudaira clan and the Tokugawa clan from the Sengoku period (period of warring states) to the early Edo Period, and refers to the successive family heads of the Hattori clan who assumed the name of 'Hanzo' for generations.

sen.j: また、歴代の当主は石見守（いわみのかみ）という官名の名乗りも持ち、服部石見守とも称した。
sen.e: These family heads also had the title of Iwami no kami (governor of Iwami Province) and sometimes called themselves HATTORI Iwami no kami.

sen.e: Although historic 'Hanzo HATTORI' were not so much a ninja but a leader of Igamono (generic name to call local samurais of Iga Province), he is now recognized as one of the most famous Iga ninjas.

sen.e: Although historically 'Hanzo HATTORI' was less a ninja than a leader of Igamono (a generic name referring to the local samurai of Iga Province), he is now recognized as one of the most famous Iga ninjas.

sen.j: このため、服部半蔵という名前の忍者が登場する小説、時代劇、漫画、ゲームなどは数知れず存在する。

sen.e: This manga adopts a typical ninja storyline; the story is set in before and after the historic Hanzo-Hattori clan was ruined and features three main motifs, ninjas controlled by Yuimura SANADA, the hegemony of the Tokugawa clan and fights behind the scenes by the shogunate spy group led by Hanzo who aims to reign over the ninja world.
